oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-12-06 - Pre-recorded messages
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pre-recorded messages from Roy Acuff, Red Foley, and Tennessee Ernie Ford, as well as a steamboat whistle sound effect and an excerpt of I'm So Lonesome I Could Cry. Used during the 1958-12-06 Prince Albert Grand Ole Opry 1000th broadcast, see TR000421 and TR000422.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Steamboat whistle -- Roy Acuff pre-recorded message -- Red Foley pre-recorded message -- I'm So Lonesome I Could Cry (Hank Williams) (recording, excerpt) -- Tennessee Ernie Ford pre-recorded message
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (Radio program); Acuff, Roy; Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Ford, Tennessee Ernie, 1919-1991
